title: FIRST LOOK: Famous Flyer 12 & City Update 11 üöÄ MSFS 2020/2024 New Content EXPLORED!
description:
Get ready for an exciting deep dive into the newest additions to Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024! In this video, we'll be giving you a comprehensive "first look" at Famous Flyer 12: the Piper PA-28-236 Dakota. We'll meticulously go through its release notes, showcasing every detail from liveries and variants to an immersive exterior and interior tour. Of course, we'll also take this beauty for a test flight to see how it performs!

Then, prepare to be amazed by City Update 11: Northeastern United States. We'll be soaring over the incredible new photogrammetry of New York City üçé and the picturesque state of Rhode Island, truly exploring how this update enhances the MSFS world. If you're eager to see what's new and whether these updates are worth your time, this video is for you! 

üîî Subscribe for more updates and tips on MSFS 2024! üëç Like this video if you found it helpful!
